title: MantraBox
blurb: A TTS mantra voice synthesizer & looper with beat-sync, cycles, and spatial/binaural layers.
description: MantraBox generates and loops spoken/toned mantras using on-device or server TTS. Choose voices and styles (chant, whisper, neutral), lock to BPM or free-run, define cycles (e.g., 108/54/27), and add solfeggio, drones, or binaural offsets. Save/share JSON presets, export stems (WAV/FLAC), and stream sessions to ISAN/ISTV. Local-first with optional server mode.

versions.notes: Binaural/solfeggio layers, export stems, JSON presets.
Beat-sync, tap tempo, accent groups, cycle counters.
